attributes.action: Ban all drivers who drink any amount of alcohol
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Anyone who has drank any alcohol at all and sat behind the wheel of a car. There should be zero tolerance, none of this banning from driving for a few months, or given a fine etc, once you have a drink even the smallest amount should be recorded and then you lose your license for 3 years, you are made to resit your test again before you drive a car, and if you are caught again then you lose your license for life.No arguments.
